meta.evidence:
Frequency hopping of the sounding reference signal is configured by the parameter b_{\text {hop }} \in\{0,1,2,3\} , given by the field b -hop contained in the higher-layer parameter freqHopping if configured, otherwise b_{\text {hop }}=0 .
